tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Sales_Representatives (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    lead_status VARCHAR(20),
    sales_progress FLOAT,
    potential_revenue DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE Leads (lead_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  lead_name STRING,
  lead_source STRING,
  lead_status STRING,
  lead_created_at TIMESTAMP,
  lead_updated_at TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE SalesProgress (progress_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  lead_id UUID,
  progress_status STRING,
  progress_description STRING,
  progress_updated_at TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE leads (
    lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_name VARCHAR(255),
    lead_status VARCHAR(50),
    lead_contact VARCHAR(100),
    lead_source VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE sales_progress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_id INT,
    progress_date DATE,
    progress_description TEXT,
    progress_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE revenue_prediction (
    prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_id INT,
    prediction_date DATE,
    predicted_revenue DECIMAL(10, 2),
    confidence_level DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Leads (
    lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_name VARCHAR(255),
    lead_source VARCHAR(255),
    lead_status VARCHAR(50),
    lead_value DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE SalesProgress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_id INT,
    sales_rep_id INT,
    progress_status VARCHAR(50),
    progress_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE leads (
 lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 lead_name VARCHAR(255),
 lead_contact VARCHAR(255),
 lead_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE sales_progress (
 progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 lead_id INT,
 progress_description TEXT,
 progress_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE revenue_prediction (
 prediction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 lead_id INT,
 predicted_revenue DECIMAL,
 prediction_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE sales_representatives (
 sales_rep_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 rep_name VARCHAR(255),
 rep_email VARCHAR(255),
 rep_contact VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE activity_log (
 log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 lead_id INT,
 activity_description TEXT,
 activity_date DATE
)
